Html:
hi radioman,

In the demo it is possible to prefetch the map of the area.

now i want to know whether it is possible to only prefetch the area of the map which is selected (i mean i don't want to see the rest of the world map...i want that place to be white or whatever color)

you understand what i mean?

wow you don't so. hmmm. i don't know how to explain that.

suppose i only want UK map and all the other maps around the world are not visible
if you cache UK, the other parts wont be cached ;]

yes this is ok and i understand that.

now i will try again to explain that.

i want UK map to be cached and leave the other part of the maps white like a white paper... mean i have a white paper and there is only one map on it colored in black.

i want to know whether it is possible or not?
